title: I Opened a Café in Another World - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adopted Protagonist   Aristocracy   Business Management   Cooking   European Ambience   Fairies   Female Protagonist   Gods   Modern Knowledge   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty
author: Amasawa Ringo   甘沢林檎
description: Kurokawa Risa is an ordinary office worker, who has practiced lots of cooking while living alone. One day, she wakes up in another world, with a concerned little spirit hovering over her! She has apparently been transported to a magical, spirit-filled realm by the will of the goddess, and there is no known way for her to go back. She is taken in by a wealthy couple, and they and her new spirit helper treat her with nothing but kindness. There is one problem, however–the food in this magical world is gross! Risa insists on helping the household cooking staff prepare a traditional meal from her world, and it is a big hit with her hosts. Soon Risa knows what she should do in this new world; she should open a cafe and treat everyone to delicious food!>
